mapper.select: SELECT i.inventory_id, s.sector_name, i.product_id, p.product_name, c.category_name, su.supplier_name, p.income_unit_price, p.outgoing_unit_price, i.inventory_quantity, i.expiration_date FROM inventory i JOIN sector s ON i.sector_id = s.sector_id JOIN product p ON i.product_id = p.product_id JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.category_id JOIN supplier su ON p.supplier_id = su.supplier_id WHERE s.warehouse_id = #{warehouseId} AND p.discontinued_status = 0

AND wareHouseId = #{warehouseId}
SELECT p.unit_capacity * i.inventory_quantity FROM product p INNER JOIN inventory i ON i.product_id = p.product_id WHERE i.inventory_id = #{inventoryId}

SELECT SUM(i.inventory_quantity) FROM inventory i INNER JOIN sector s ON s.sector_id = i.inventory_id INNER JOIN warehouse w ON s.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id GROUP BY w.warehouse_id, i.product_id HAVING w.warehouse_id = #{warehouseId} AND i.product_id = #{productId}
